first_translate: listen carefully,  fiona.

hangle: 어니스트 공작은 내가 무슨 말을 하든 반대할 테니
first_translate: no matter what I say today, duke ernest will disagree...
...so just ignore him.
pardon me?

hangle: 현 황후를 배출한 가문을 그렇게 대해도 되는 거예요?
first_translate: is that how we’re supposed to treat the family from which our current empress comes?
it is.
the house of ernest supports the crown prince,

hangle: 새로운 황자인 시그렌을 보호하고 있는 헤일론과는 대립할 수밖에 없긴 한데,
first_translate: and since they must oppose any forces protecting the new emperor, sigren, there’s no way for them not to clash with us haylons.
but still, ignoring them? really?
not only ernest.

hangle: 에레즈 가문도 황태자 지지 세력이니 무시해라.
first_translate: since house ereze also supports the crown prince, you can disregard whatever they have to say as well.
then what about houses priscilla and clovis?
well, officially speaking, both families remain neutral,

hangle: 말이 중립이지 둘 다 그냥 간만 보고 있어.
first_translate: but unofficially, they’re all sitting on the fence.
I see.
this was more or less what I expected anyway.
hello, your grace.
everyone else awaits inside.
okay then, so let's get straight to the point--
get straight to the point?
do exactly as you please.
that sounds like something abel would say.
he’s here.
duke abel heylong.
seems I’m last again.
wow... look at this atmosphere.
definitely...

hangle: 저 불만 가득한 사람이 어니스트 공작.
first_translate: ...the one full of complaints over there is duke ernest.
next to him sits marquess ereze.
to my right is marquess priscilla.
and finally...

hangle: 내 진짜 정체를 곧 알게 될
first_translate: marquess arendt clovis,
who’ll soon find out my real identity.

hangle: 왜 또 자리는 이렇게 맞은 편이어서~!
first_translate: why do I always end up across from everyone?! why?!
your grace.

hangle: 옆에 있는 그 영애는 누구인지 궁금하군.
first_translate: I wonder if you could tell me who that young lady next to you might be.

hangle: 이곳은 가주와 후계자 외에는 참석할 수 없는 자리이네.
first_translate: as far as I know, these meetings are restricted to heads of households and their successors alone.
in fact, now seems like the perfect time to introduce her.
fiona heylong.
my successor.
uh...
successor...?
didn’t realize his grace had a daughter.
oh, she isn’t mine by blood.

hangle: …그렇다면 어느 가문의 아가씨를 양녀로 들인 건가?
first_translate: if that’s the case, whose child did you adopt into your household?
count green’s.

hangle: 어차피 이건 조금만 조사하면 금방 알 수 있는 것이니….
first_translate: anyway, anyone can easily figure this stuff out after some research...
the greens...?

hangle: 그 가문은 현재 마약 관련 사업 혐의로
first_translate: all members of that family are currently under investigation due to allegations related to drug trafficking.

hangle: 가문의 일원이 전부 조사받고 있을 텐데.
first_translate: at least, that’s what I heard.

hangle: 이미 결혼한 탓에 처벌을 면한 딸이 하나 있다곤 들었지만.
first_translate: rumor has it though that one married daughter managed to avoid punishment.
actuallY, there were two daughters.

hangle: 그린가의 일을 제가 맡았기에 잘 알고 있죠.
first_translate: I took care of matters regarding house green myself, so I'm quite aware of everything.
yes, I suppose most of you already suspect this much,
but I am indeed the bastard child of house green.

hangle: 제가 처벌을 받지 않은 건 그 전에 호적에서 사라졌기 때문이죠.
first_translate: the reason I wasn’t punished along with the rest of my family is because I’d been erased from the records beforehand.
a fallen noblewoman...
...and illegitimate too?
on top of being barely legal herself!

hangle: 본래 아들한테 가문을 물려주는 것이 원칙이거늘!
first_translate: normally, titles pass down through sons!
are you testing us,
duke heylong?
of course not.
I refuse to accept this.

hangle: 몰락 귀족 가문의 사생아가 헤일론 공작 작위를 물려받다니.
first_translate: an illegitimate child from a fallen noble family inheriting the title of duke heylong?

hangle: 헤일론 가는 제국의 주요 가문 중 하나네.
first_translate: house heylong is among the major powers within the empire.

hangle: 그런데 이토록 안하무인으로 행동하면 귀족 사회의 기강이 어떻게 되겠는가!
first_translate: what kind of example does such reckless behavior set before other nobles?!
if you want to know what happens when someone acts recklessly,
I guess I'll make sure to give my own daughter the title instead.
scary...

hangle: 어쨌거나 어니스트 공작이 무슨 생각을 하는진 알겠어.
first_translate: now I understand where duke ernest stands.

hangle: 공작은 머리가 굳을 대로 굳은 사람이다.
first_translate: he’s simply set in his ways.
given that I’m female,

hangle: 거기에 어리기까지 하니 절대 인정할 수 없단 거다.
first_translate: illegitimate, and young, he refuses to acknowledge me outright.
if things continue like this, life may become troublesome sooner rather than later.
your grace.
I fully comprehend why you feel uneasy.

hangle: 예컨대, 제 능력이 미숙하여 가문을 지탱하기 힘들 걸 염려하시는 거겠죠?
first_translate: for instance, perhaps you worry that I lack sufficient ability to support the duchy properly?
as fellow members of society, I completely understand your concerns.
ahem.
you seem easier to talk to compared to his grace.

hangle: 그렇다면 어떤 식으로 제 능력을 증명해야
first_translate: then how shall I prove my abilities...
...in order to alleviate your worries?
prove yourself?

hangle: 너 같은 애가 딱히 할 수 있는 일은…
first_translate: there aren’t many things a girl like you can even do...
wait, actually, that’s not bad.
house heylong serves as the shield of the empire.

hangle: 그 지방의 영주라면 응당 마물에 대응할 줄 알아야겠지.
first_translate: thus, its ruler ought to know how to deal with monsters.

hangle: 그러니 곧 열릴 사냥 대회에서 우승해 보여라.
first_translate: so go win first place at the upcoming hunting competition.

hangle: 네가 우승하면, 나 역시 더 이상 참견하지 않겠다.
first_translate: if you succeed, I won’t bother you anymore.
cat got your tongue?

hangle: 하긴 칼자루 한 번 잡아보지 못했을 여자애한테 마물이라니.
first_translate: come on, a little girl who probably hasn’t ever held a sword hilt in her hand dealing with monsters?
my dear--!!!
she'd faint merely looking at a monster tail.

hangle: 헤일론 공작의 창피가 눈에 선 한…
first_translate: I can almost picture the shame of house heylong...
alright.
I promise to take first prize at the monster hunt.
I didn’t expect it to be resolved so quickly.
then...

hangle: 어니스트 공작님이 하신 제안의 증인은 우리가 하겠습니다.
first_translate: we shall serve as witnesses to your proposal, your grace.
v-very good.

hangle: …마물을 잡는다는 게 무슨 뜻인지는 아는 거겠지?
first_translate: by the way, do you even know what catching monsters entails?
of course I do.
don’t worry, I won’t run away or hide.
I’ll finish them off once and for all.
whew.
glad the meeting ended without incident.
looks like his grace went downstairs ahead of me.
lady fiona.
th-this voice...

hangle: 이런 곳에서 다시 뵐 줄은 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I never thought I’d meet you somewhere like this.
sel-lin.
arendt clovis!!!
